channel.title: A ::report command
channel.description:
I want a command that allows a user to report a player to all moderators/admins on the server and give an offense.
Example:
::report jtsou bad language
that would send this message to all players on the server with player rights 1 or higher:
[report] jtsou bad language
i need to know if it can be done. Or if you have the code i will take that. Thanks.

item.title: A ::report command
item.dc:creator: @jtsou jtsou
item.description:
@jtsou wrote:

I dont want all that fancy stuff

just a command that sends a text report to all mods/admins

Read full topic

item.title: A ::report command
item.dc:creator: @RawksDrift RawksDrift
item.description:
@RawksDrift wrote:

Ive heard that theres software were you enter your E-mail Address and it sends you an E-mail on the report. I tried to fetch that software for you but came up short… Sorry i couldn’t help :(.

Read full topic

@jtsou wrote:

well if the report abuse works where will i get the information?

item.title: A ::report command
item.dc:creator: @RawksDrift RawksDrift
item.description:
@RawksDrift wrote:

This may not be very helpful but most servers the Report Abuse button works. If not you could just contact or private message an Admin or Moderator. Sorry if this wasn’t the post you were looking for.

Read full topic
